content:
Anyone interested in .webp support?
https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4509

Add webp support 路 Issue #4509 路 backdrop/backdrop-issues
Description of the need A common "Opportunity" listed in Google PageSpeed insights is to "Serve images in next-gen formats." Backdrop does not currently support any next-gen for...

This, as well as native support of animated gif, and svg come up every once in a while from digital agencies. It'd be nice to have, but we'd need to make them work with image styles (and there are security concerns with .svg)

Hm. Does gd support .webp anyway? It's not just a thing of "add an extension in a list". I know that imagemagick handles .webp well, but never heard anything regarding gd. Animated gif and svg are a different issue.
Ah, OK, gd can support .webp, but it's not necessarily enabled and depends on the php version.
